overview: Zumba for Beginners will show you step-by-step how to perform all the Zumba moves.  You will learn the exclusive and fun Latin dance steps that Beto has put together to create an exhilarating aerobic workout. You will easily be able to follow Beto's instructions and moves, and you will be Zumba-ing like a pro in no time!
title: Zumba Beginners
